## setUVsBasic() function

setUVsBasic is a function that allows you to set the UVs of a shape to a basic 0-1 UV space.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setUVsBasic(rows: number, cols: number): number[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rows | number | The number of rows in the grid |
|  cols | number | The number of columns in the grid |

<b>Returns:</b>

number\[\]

- Returns an array of Vector2s that represent the UVs for a grid of rows and columns
